title: Topic 001 Question 022
body: A SysOps administrator is responsible for managing a company's cloud infrastructure with AWS CloudFormation. The SysOps administrator needs to create a single resource that consists of multiple AWS services. The resource must support creation and deletion through the CloudFormation console.
Which CloudFormation resource type should the SysOps administrator create to meet these requirements?
options: AWS::EC2::Instance with a cfn-init helper script
